36#include <config.h>
37
38#include <string.h>
39
40#include <krb5/roken.h>
41
42#ifndef HAVE_STRSEP_COPY
43
44/* strsep, but with const stringp, so return string in buf */
45
46ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION ssize_t ROKEN_LIB_CALL
47strsep_copy(const char **stringp, const char *delim, char *buf, size_t len)
48{
49 const char *save = *stringp;
50 size_t l;
51 if(save == NULL)
52 return -1;
53 *stringp = *stringp + strcspn(*stringp, delim);
54 l = min(len, (size_t)(*stringp - save));
55 if(len > 0) {
56 memcpy(buf, save, l);
57 buf[l] = '\0';
58 }
59
60 l = *stringp - save;
61 if(**stringp == '\0')
62 *stringp = NULL;
63 else
64 (*stringp)++;
65 return l;
66}
67
68#endif
69
